archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Capacity Time Period
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define a time period for which available capacity and/or capacity demand is specified and captured.

properties.value: Define Capacity Time Period defines a time period for which available capacity and/or capacity demand is specified and captured. A time period can be expressed in days of the week or for a from/to date or (near) real-time. This process also is used to modify and remove a capacity time period.
